_header: Pray we to God that all my guide
Note:
See Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 1335.
Subjects: prayers, special occasions; rounds; France, invasion of (1513)
_description: Prayer for victory in France, A.D. 1513, a round — six lines

BLAdd31922.Transcription: Pray we to god that all may gydethat for our kyng so to providto send hym power to hys coragehe may acheffe this gret viagenow let vs syng this rownd all threesent george graunt hym þe victory
